data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Bob and Susie go to the supermarket together every Sunday night. They ____ all ____ food ____ breakfast ____ dinner ____ the ____. Bob ____ eats ____ at ____ with ____. Susie takes fruit from home to work for lunch.
data.partBlankContent: Bob and Susie go to the supermarket together every Sunday night. They b__ all th___ food f__ breakfast a__ dinner f__ the we__. Bob alw___ eats lu___ at wo__ with fri____. Susie takes fruit from home to work for lunch.
data.answer: 鲍勃和苏茜每个星期天晚上都一起去超市。他们买了一周所有的早餐和晚餐。鲍勃总是在工作的时候和朋友一起吃午饭。苏茜从家里带水果去上班当午餐。
